options(golem.app.prod = FALSE) # TRUE = production mode, FALSE = development mode

golem::document_and_reload()

library(ShiBA)
# Exemple glmShiba


fit <- ShiBA:::glm_Shiba(iris,formule =Sepal.Length ~., type="lin",refresh = 0)
# exemple shibaplo


ShiBA:::shibaGlmPlot(fit,"lin",pars=names(fit$coefficients),hist = T)
#> `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.



seuilTwoIt<- list(type = "seuil",plusieur_seuils=F,val =-1.1)

ShiBA:::shibaGlmPlot(fit,"lin",pars=names(fit$coefficients),hist = T,seuilTwoIt = seuilTwoIt,color_1 = "#0000FF",color_2 = "red", )
#> Joining with `by = join_by(parameter)`
#> `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
#> `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
#> Warning: Removed 1 rows containing missing values (`geom_segment()`).



ShiBA:::shibaGlmPlot(fit,"lin",pars=names(fit$coefficients),hist = F,seuilTwoIt = seuilTwoIt)
#> Joining with `by = join_by(parameter)`
#> Warning: Removed 6144 rows containing missing values
#> (`geom_segment()`).



seuilTwoIt<- list(type = "",plusieur_seuils=T,val=list(var= "Petal.Length",
                                                       theta_A_min=-1,
                                                       theta_A_max = 0,
                                                       theta_P_min=0,
                                                       theta_P_max = 1))

ShiBA:::shibaGlmTable(fit,type_glm = "lin" , seuilTwoIt = seuilTwoIt)
#>                  var        50%       2.5%       97.5%    Two It
#> 1:       (Intercept)  2.1734112  1.6092845  2.72386645          
#> 2:       Sepal.Width  0.4971762  0.3258857  0.66975249          
#> 3:      Petal.Length  0.8271720  0.6922403  0.95861889   H|Prior
#> 4:              <NA>         NA         NA          NA H|DonnÃ©es
#> 5:       Petal.Width -0.3141473 -0.6124264 -0.01790458          
#> 6: Speciesversicolor -0.7150515 -1.2005245 -0.23611147          
#> 7:  Speciesvirginica -1.0127811 -1.6701810 -0.34946295          
#> 8:             sigma  0.3083498  0.2750774  0.34723367          
#>    HA : Pr(-1 < diff < 0) HP : Pr(0 < diff < 1)
#> 1:                                             
#> 2:                                             
#> 3:                0.30353                     0
#> 4:                0.30384                     0
#> 5:                                             
#> 6:                                             
#> 7:                                             
#> 8:
seuilTwoIt<- list(type = "seuil",plusieur_seuils=T,val=c(0.1,0.52,-0.13,0.4,0.5))

ShiBA:::shibaGlmTable(fit,type_glm = "lin" , seuilTwoIt = seuilTwoIt)
#>                  var        50%       2.5%       97.5% Seuil   Prob
#> 1:       (Intercept)  2.1734112  1.6092845  2.72386645             
#> 2:       Sepal.Width  0.4971762  0.3258857  0.66975249   0.1      1
#> 3:      Petal.Length  0.8271720  0.6922403  0.95861889  0.52      1
#> 4:       Petal.Width -0.3141473 -0.6124264 -0.01790458 -0.13 0.1071
#> 5: Speciesversicolor -0.7150515 -1.2005245 -0.23611147   0.4      0
#> 6:  Speciesvirginica -1.0127811 -1.6701810 -0.34946295   0.5      0
#> 7:             sigma  0.3083498  0.2750774  0.34723367
fit2 <- ShiBA:::glm_Shiba(mtcars,formule =vs~1, type="binom",refresh = 0)

library(ShiBA)
library(ggplot2)
#> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.1.3




ShiBA:::shibaGlmTable(fit2,type_glm = "binom")
#>             OR       50%      2.5%    97.5%
#> 1: (Intercept) 0.7767051 0.3835943 1.526112
ShiBA:::diag_convergence(fit2)
#> [1] TRUE
